mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys990030 ( TABLENAME, FILESEARCHKEY, SAVEFILENAME, ORGFILENAME, FILESIZE, PATH, REGUSER, REGDATE, SITEID, IMGPATH, ISDELETE ) VALUES ( #{tablename}, #{filesearchkey}, #{savefilename}, #{orgfilename}, #{filesize}, #{path}, #{userno}, now(), #{siteid}, #{imgpath}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT SAVEFILENAME, PATH, ORGFILENAME, FILESIZE, FILEID FROM sys990030 WHERE FILEID = #{fileid}
